Item ID3097

Steel claws are a fast two-handed melee weapon. To wield them the player must have at least level 5 Attack. They are given as a reward for completing the Death Plateau quest.

After completing the Death Plateau quest, they can be created at 43 Smithing. They require 2 Steel bars, and yield 75 Smithing experience. They can also be bought from Martin Thwait in the Rogues' Den.

[[File:Steel claws detail.png|left|140px]]
'''Steel claws''' are a fast two-handed [[melee]] [[weapon]]. To wield them the player must have at least level 5 [[Attack]]. They are given as a reward for completing the [[Death Plateau]] quest.

After completing the Death Plateau quest, they can be created at 43 [[Smithing]]. They require 2 [[Steel bar]]s, and yield 75 Smithing experience. They can also be bought from [[Martin Thwait]] in the [[Rogues' Den]].
